/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a typical day in the city.
